## Discussion

An entity has at most one parent entity. If an entity isn’t part of a hierarchy, or if it is a root entity, the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasHierarchy/parent] property is `nil`.

Use the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasHierarchy/setParent(_:preservingWorldTransform:)] method to change an entity’s parent. Use the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasHierarchy/removeFromParent(preservingWorldTransform:)] method to remove the parent. These methods automatically update the corresponding [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasHierarchy/children] collections of the new and old parent.

# parent

**Instance Property**

The parent entity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var parent: Entity? { get }
```

## Discussion

An entity has at most one parent entity. If an entity isn’t part of a hierarchy, or if it is a root entity, the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasHierarchy/parent] property is `nil`.

Use the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasHierarchy/setParent(_:preservingWorldTransform:)] method to change an entity’s parent. Use the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasHierarchy/removeFromParent(preservingWorldTransform:)] method to remove the parent. These methods automatically update the corresponding [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasHierarchy/children] collections of the new and old parent.

## Managing the parent

- **setParent(_:preservingWorldTransform:)**: Attaches the entity as a child to the specified entity.
- **removeFromParent(preservingWorldTransform:)**: Removes the entity from its current parent or from the scene if it is a root entity.
